see cloudmesh.cmd5

* https://github.com/cloudmesh/cloudmesh.cmd5



## Jupyter on rivanna

```
# cms vpn connect
local>
  cms rivanna a100
a100>
  # source your ENV3
  pip install pip -U
  pip install jupyterlab 
  pip install jupyter
```


```
rivanna>
  pip install pip -U
  pip install jupyterlab
  pip install notebook
```
